item.description:
For the person that just wants to have fun while getting in shape, this class is perfect. A different routine will be taught each week. Music will vary anywhere from Janet Jackson to Missy Elliot. This class will build and strengthen lean muscle, increase flexibility, and shed calories. Each class will start with an intense stretching warm up that incorporates some pilates. At the end of the class we will work towards developing a "six pack" with a 10 minute abdominal work out. But, in between it's just dance, dance, dance.......So take some "me" time and sign up.

*To attend this class you must register here: http://bridgetsdances...
You don't have to pre-pay, just enter some basic info so the instructor knows your coming.

The class is $10 or you can purchase a pack of ten for $90 (can be mixed and matched with strip fit and pilates)

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Hip Hop
